name: RailsApps learn-rails
description: Tutorial application from the book 'Learn Ruby on Rails' by Daniel Kehoe

MAILCHIMP_API_KEY.description: Create a MailChimp account and enter your API key here.

MAILCHIMP_LIST_ID.description: Create a MailChimp mailing list and enter it here.

OWNER_EMAIL.description: Destination for messages sent from the app's contact form.

DOMAIN_NAME.description: Required for sending mail. Use the app name you've given.
